attributes.action: ensure that details regarding criminal convictions about a prospective and serving politicians are made public to the elctorate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A prospective /serving Councillor or MP who has broken the law should have to declare to the electorate of a constituency if they have any criminal convictions and the type of conviction. For example, if a Councillor has been caught claiming illegal benefits, it is hypercritical if they are condemning members of the public who are doing the same. The parties should have to delare each year and prior to any elections if any party members and not just elected officials have been convicted of a crime and the seriousness of the crime. Politicians are good are telling the public how to behave but the public should have the right to konw if they are doing the same.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
